title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not persisted between sessions.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions, allowing users to easily access recently opened files.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
